title: Delhi - Manali - Amritsar - Delhi - Agra
text: # 1 Hi Guys, -> My family have planned a trip to himachal starting October 16 ,Please need a itenary so that i can book my hotels , I am very confused and want the trip to be very memorable . Please help me . -> I want the trip to be scenic and away from crowd , commercialized places. -> I also want to know what will be the weather condition if i want to do a leh - ladakh trip or Spiti trip -> We are 3 couples , and planning to hire a car with driver from Delhi I have booked tickets to and fro tickets from bangalore to Delhi from OCt 16 - Oct 26 .. I will reach Delhi on 16th at 5 in the evening . I want these places to be covered Shimla , MAnali , Rohtang , Amritsar ( wagah , golden temple ) Mandi , Khajjar . I am confused can we infuse agra in the trip or not ( Im not too keen on going to agra ) . But if there is nothing to see then I might go to agra . I have a tentative plan to travel to agra on the day we arrive delhi that is OCt 16 and vist Taj and leave to shimla via overnight train or bus from Delhi . I saw so many threads and found so many location Mcloudganj , Dharmshala , Solang , Parashar Lake , Kinauur, Kangra near manali but can make up my mind , About the stay , at shimla and other scenic places , Plese tell me the best hotel i Can enjoy my stay and view in budget of ( 2k - 3k ) . Other places i will manage. I am counting on you gouys and waiting for you valuable input , My dad is losing his patience coz i havent given him any plan from last month . Thanks in advance
